laboratory_examinations.findings: Right atrial diameter of 6.2 cm (normal diameter, 2.2-4.1 cm), right ventricle short-axis end-diastolic diameter of 5.1 cm (normal, 1.9 - 4.0 cm), right ventricle with eccentric hypertrophy and fractional area shortening of 33%
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: At 31 weeks' gestation, right atrial diameter increased to 6.3 cm, end-diastolic ventricular diameter increased to 5.4 cm, and fractional area shortening decreased to 25%

laboratory_examinations.findings: Reaction time: 6.0 mm; clot formation time: 2.0 mm; maximal amplitude: 76 mm; clot formation rate: 74%
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Mild changes post-delivery: reaction time changed from 3.5-4.0 mm, clot formation time changed from 2.0-2.5 mm, maximal amplitude changed from 63-66 mm, clot formation rate remained 74-76%, and platelet aggregation remained 65-86%

laboratory_examinations.findings: Atrial diameter of 7.4 cm, end-diastolic ventricular diameter of 5.7 cm, low (20%) fractional area shortening of the right ventricle, newly patent foramen ovale with right-to-left shunt
